features: Complete Hydration for Skin & Lips – Treat yourself or a loved one to this ultimate skincare gift set, featuring Aloe Vera Hydrating Night Cream (50ml), Hyaluronic Face & Body Mist (200ml), and Sweet Blueberry Moisturising Lip Balm. Perfect for gifts for women or beauty gift sets.

Deeply Nourishing Aloe Vera Night Cream – Enriched with over 75 active ingredients, including Vitamin E, this cream soothes redness and hydrates overnight. Its vegan formula with glycerin and emollients makes it ideal for sensitive skin care sets and women's skincare gift sets.

Revitalizing Hyaluronic Face & Body Mist – Instantly refresh and lock in moisture with Sodium Hyaluronate, Peptides, and Betaine. A must-have in any skincare kit or skin care bundle, perfect for reviving dull skin post-shower or throughout the day.

Pretty Sweet Blueberry Lip Balm – Pamper your lips with long-lasting hydration and a delightful blueberry scent. This balm leaves lips smooth and shiny, making it a fantastic addition to mini skincare sets, skincare sets for teenagers, or skincare gift sets for women.

Vegan-Friendly & Travel-Ready – Designed for all skin types, this travel-size skincare set is perfect for skincare travel sets. Whether as a Christmas gift or everyday skincare bundle, it’s an ideal choice for skin care sets for women and teens alike.
description: Product description Indulge in the ultimate skincare set with the Face Facts Hydrating Skincare Set, crafted to deliver hydration and nourishment for your face and body. This thoughtfully curated skincare gift set for women includes three premium products: Aloe Vera Hydrating Night Cream (50ml), Hyaluronic Face & Body Mist (200ml), and Pretty Sweet Blueberry Moisturising Lip Balm. Designed to suit all skin types, this beauty gift set is ideal for restoring moisture, reducing redness, and keeping your skin soft and smooth. Whether you’re gifting a loved one or enhancing your skincare routine, this travel-size skincare set is the perfect choice for sensitive skin care sets or women's skincare gift sets. The Aloe Vera Hydrating Night Cream is enriched with over 75 active ingredients, including Vitamin E, glycerin, and soothing emollients, providing overnight hydration while reducing redness. Complementing this, the Hyaluronic Face & Body Mist is infused with Sodium Hyaluronate, Peptides, and Betaine, locking in moisture and refreshing dull, dehydrated skin throughout the day. The Sweet Blueberry Moisturising Lip Balm completes this skincare bundle, offering long-lasting hydration and a subtle shine to keep lips smooth and healthy. Perfect for those seeking skincare sets for women or a versatile skincare gift set, this mini skincare set is vegan-friendly and designed to enhance any skincare routine with simplicity and care. Safety Warning For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
